GithublearngitGitHublearngitGitHubGitHub

```
$ git remote add origin git@github.com:<name>/learngit.git

```

```

 **git push** master

master**-u**Gitmastermastermastermaster

```

masterGitHub

### 

```
$ git clone git@github.com:<name>/<repo name>.git
```



```
$ git clone https://github.com/<naem>/<repo name>.git
```



## **

### 

```
$ git branch
```

### 

```
$ git branch <name>
```

### 

```
$ git checkout <name>
```

### +

```
$ git checkout -b <name>
```

### 

```
$ git merge <name>
```

### 



```
$ git branch -d <name>
```



```
$ git branch -D <name>
```

### 

```
$ git stash
```



```
$ git stash list
```



git stash applystashgit stash drop

```
git stash apply <stash idstash list>
```

git stash popstash

```
$ git stash pop
```



[Git](https://www.liaoxuefeng.com/wiki/0013739516305929606dd18361248578c67b8067c8c017b000)

Post.title: Hexonext
Post._content: ## Hexo--next ### **next** ``` git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next ``` **themes** **next** ![next_download](hexo-next/next_download.png) **_config.yml** **theme** ![theme](hexo-next/theme.png) **next** ``` hexo clean && hexo g && hexo s ``` [localhost:4000](http://localhost:4000) ![next_normal](hexo-next/next_normal.png) ### **next** **scheme** **next** **_config.yml** ![scheme](hexo-next/scheme.png) ![pisces](hexo-next/pisces.png) ### **next** **_config.yml** **menu** ![menu](hexo-next/menu.png) **#** **404** ``` hexo new page "" ``` **source** ![menu_show](hexo-next/menu_show.png) ### logo 1. **_config.yml** **sidebar:** **position** **right** **left** ![sidebar](hexo-next/sidebar.png) 2. **_config.yml** **avatar** ![avatar](hexo-next/avatar.png) 3.logo **_config.yml** **favicon** **medium** logo ![favicon](hexo-next/favicon.png) ### # **/themes/next/layout/_macro/post.swig** **rel="tag">#** **#** **** ![jin](hexo-next/jin.png) ### **\themes\next\source\css\_custom\custom.styl** , ``` // .post { margin-top: 60px; margin-bottom: 60px; padding: 25px; -webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(202, 203, 203, .5); -moz-box-shadow: 0 0 5px rgba(202, 203, 204, .5); } ``` ![yin](hexo-next/yin.png) ## ### **/themes/next/source/js/src** **clicklove.js** ``` !function(e,t,a){function n(){c(".heart{width: 10px;height: 10px;position: fixed;background: #f00;transform: rotate(45deg);-webkit-transform: rotate(45deg);-moz-transform: rotate(45deg);}.heart:after,.heart:before{content: '';width: inherit;height: inherit;background: inherit;border-radius: 50%;-webkit-border-radius: 50%;-moz-border-radius: 50%;position: fixed;}.heart:after{top: -5px;}.heart:before{left: -5px;}"),o(),r()}function r(){for(var e=0;e ``` ![heart](hexo-next/heart.png) ### **/themes/next/source/css/_common/components/sidebar/sidebar-author.styl** ``` .site-author-image { display: block; margin: 0 auto; padding: $site-author-image-padding; max-width: $site-author-image-width; height: $site-author-image-height; border: $site-author-image-border-width solid $site-author-image-border-color; border-radius: 60%; transition: 2.5s all; } .site-author-image:hover { transform: rotate(360deg); } .site-author-name { margin: $site-author-name-margin; text-align: $site-author-name-align; color: $site-author-name-color; font-weight: $site-author-name-weight; } .site-description { margin-top: $site-description-margin-top; text-align: $site-description-align; font-size: $site-description-font-size; color: $site-description-color; } ```

Post.title: Hello, blog!
Post._content:
Github Pages + hexo
 ## ### Node.js [](https://nodejs.org/en/download/)
![node_npm](Hello-blog-0/node_npm.png)
### git [](https://git-scm.com/downloads)
![git_suc](Hello-blog-0/git_suc.png)
### hexo **E:/Notes/** blog
![cd_blog](Hello-blog-0/cd_blog.png)
**npm install hexo -g** hexo
![hexo_ins](Hello-blog-0/hexo_ins.png)
**hexo init** **npm install**
![blog_dir](Hello-blog-0/blog_dir.png)
hexo **hexo g && hexo s** 4000 **http://localhost:4000** hexo
![hexo_first](Hello-blog-0/hexo_first.png)
## Github ### Github Pages [Github](https://github.com/).github.ioInitialize this repository with a README
![github_cre](Hello-blog-0/github_cre.png)
settingsGitHub Pages:
![github_page](Hello-blog-0/github_page.png)
### HexoGithub page githubssh keygit[](https://help.github.com/articles/generating-a-new-ssh-key-and-adding-it-to-the-ssh-agent/) gitbash here **ssh -T git@github.com** sshHi
![git_ssh](Hello-blog-0/git_ssh.png)
hexo **blog/_config.yml** **deploy:**
![deploy](Hello-blog-0/deploy.png)
hcwnbs ## ### cmd **hexo new post **
![new_post](Hello-blog-0/new_post.png)
_posts
![hellohexo](Hello-blog-0/hellohexo.png)
**npm install hexo-deployer-git --save** **hello-hexo.md** **markdown** **markdown** [Cmd Markdown](https://www.zybuluo.com/mdeditor)
![hexomd](Hello-blog-0/hexomd.png)
**hexo clean && hexo g && hexo d** **http://.github.io**
![hexoshow](Hello-blog-0/hexoshow.png)
[](https://hcwnbs.github.io/2018/07/16/hexo-next/)
